name: Froggo+ v0.1
description:
This is my little game project written in Python and I will slowly develop it whenever I feel like it. It currently has 2 fully designed and finished level but I will add more over time. Will probably make it a paid game whenever I finish it.

Controls:

Z - Jump
X - Tongue / Run
Arrow keys - Move
( Double tap arrow keys also allow you to run )
Buttons can be remapped.

note: the source code is included with the game.
